content: ***what better place to stash handmade blankets than inside a handmade basket *** use this chunky crochet basket to stash oversized gifts at the holidays then repurpose it for stylish storage for the rest of the year have fun with different color combinations and sizes to fit every corner and counter in your home **size** 22 in diameter 18 height **suggested yarn** lion brand hue + me yarn or any equivalent bulky weight yarn held double throughout **hooks used** 9mm and 6 5mm crochet hook **notions used** scissors tapestry needle tape measure locking stitch marker t-pins optional garment steamer optional ** find the free pattern + tutorial video here 1 ** // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 https //tlycblog com/fireside-basket-a-free-oversized-crochet-blanket-basket-pattern/
